data.text: @FreyaMeansLady I Love It !!!!! Nice meeting you too!

@CordialCortex Personally, with sunglasses & a mask I can make faces and say things under my breath and roll my eyes all I want and nobody can see. That’s a win. Followed you back by the way, nice to meet you.
@FreyaMeansLady Agreed 100％ don't care if I am the only one wearing a mask in public places. I ignore any commens or looks. High school is over at my age!

@FreyaMeansLady I am going to get a fourth Moderna shot in a few weeks since I am immune suppressed. I have stopped wearing my mask for many of the functions here and with family. But if I leave my development, the mask is on. And it is on when workman enter my apartment.
